body_html: I haven't been able to code up a solution where the modules share the encoder embedding yet, but yes, that's the idea. The only thing that I want to be unique is the attention component - the encoder should be idempotent across the modules. I'll report back on doing the former.

body: I haven't been able to code up a solution where the modules share the encoder embedding yet, but yes, that's the idea. The only thing that I want to be unique is the attention component - the encoder should be idempotent across the modules. I'll report back on doing the former.
